mapper.select: select * from chat_info where user_from = #{query.userFrom} and user_to = #{query.userTo} and content_status = 0 limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into chat_info(user_from, content, user_to, content_status, update_time, create_time) values (#{query.userFrom}, #{query.content}, #{query.userTo}, 0, now(), now());
mapper.update: update chat_info set content_status = #{status} where id = #{id}
